channel.title: Pen Tablet Drawings
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I got a pen tablet (bamboo) for Christmas and I've been toying around with Photoshop and PaintTool SAI and I was wondering if you guys could give me any tips or brush settings (or links to brushes). I've only finished 3 drawings
1st: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NX32R.png[/img]
2nd [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eJUnN.png[/img]
3rd [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/26EZt.png[/img]
and here's my current WIP: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vXL3w.png[/img]

item.title: Pen Tablet Drawings
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

you have to understand that i just started a few weeks ago. all of these sketches are practice sketches. Expect the quality to get better over time.

Read full topic

item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

these anime drawings just look werid, no offense
They are alittle disporportioned even as an anime character, theres not details in the eyes
theres no light, they aren’t alive.
draw both eyes, details should be considered

@LilXCj wrote:

This one was based off memory. Trying to work on hats, proportions, perspective, anatomy, and coloring.

and this is just a quick one i did cause i love misty.

and a bunch of eyes

item.title: Pen Tablet Drawings
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:3, topic:477139”]http://i.imgur.com/NX32R.png

hope you didnt show her that, she looks fatter in the drawing :I[/quote]

I did show her that, she loved the drawing. The line work is all that really makes it look fatter. Plus, somehow I changed the perspective while drawing her so it’s actually not that different in face size.

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:4, topic:477139”]Finally some quality in here. I will try to make my own thread when I get the tablet I ordered. Then I can’t complain about anyone anymore.

You got the same $80 tablet as Frell?[/quote]

I believe it was $80, yeah. I can’t really remember. I just picked the cheapest one off the bamboo website. Can’t wait to see what you put up. I plan on doing landscapes and stuff but I’m researching and figuring out anatomy right now.

Read full topic
